code: import{CONSTANTS}from"../actions";import uuid from"uuidv4";export var addList=function addList(title){return function(dispatch,getState){var boardID=getState().activeBoard;var id=uuid();dispatch({type:CONSTANTS.ADD_LIST,payload:{title:title,boardID:boardID,id:id}});};};export var sort=function sort(droppableIdStart,droppableIdEnd,droppableIndexStart,droppableIndexEnd,draggableId,type){return function(dispatch,getState){var boardID=getState().activeBoard;dispatch({type:CONSTANTS.DRAG_HAPPENED,payload:{droppableIdStart:droppableIdStart,droppableIdEnd:droppableIdEnd,droppableIndexEnd:droppableIndexEnd,droppableIndexStart:droppableIndexStart,draggableId:draggableId,type:type,boardID:boardID}});};};export var editTitle=function editTitle(listID,newTitle){return{type:CONSTANTS.EDIT_LIST_TITLE,payload:{listID:listID,newTitle:newTitle}};};export var deleteList=function deleteList(listID){return function(dispatch,getState){var boardID=getState().activeBoard;return dispatch({type:CONSTANTS.DELETE_LIST,payload:{listID:listID,boardID:boardID}});};};
